Params: You spot something rather unusual on the street.
Sponsored by the ACA, the Mini Asslam is preparing for departure...
Last call for boarding! Passengers onboard, please secure yourselves to avoid any mishaps!
Sophia is holding a sign with both hands right in the middle of the street. Behind her, a line of children are making playful faces.
The first child is clinging to Sophia's mechanical arm, with the others holding onto the shoulders of the child in front, forming a long line.
Parents on either side of the line are chatting and laughing.
Checking for stragglers, Sophia then notices you.
This is the remarkable Mini Asslam, courtesy of the esteemed ACA.
I offer personalized tours of Constellia's renowned shops, complete with detailed explanations and exceptional service.
Children under four feet travel free, but a 50% service charge applies to adults.
Unfortunately, my finances are rather limited at the moment.
I see. The train's about to pull out. Watch yourself, Commandant.
You step back to make room, watching Sophia lead a long line forward.
The line of children explodes in giggles and laughter.
Didn't peg the ACA for such philanthropy.
Just as you are wrapping your head around it, the child-train led by Sophia veers off to a block on the left.
That's where all the Akdilek toy stores and candy stalls are.
The shopkeepers' faces light up with sly smiles as the gaggle of children approaches.
You follow the train for a while, passing through several areas, until someone else takes the reins from Sophia.
After handing off the sign, she saunters back toward you.
Sales are on target, but my work's not quite done.
I have one last VIP to take care of.
Sophia bows to you, then turns around.
Sophia of Akdilek Commercial Alliance's Asslam at your service.
The train's about to depart, so hop aboard quickly!
Does she want you to line up behind her?
You are hardly a kid anymore. This feels a little... awkward.
I can't exactly afford the ticket price.
This is a special train, tickets are on the house.
It'd be rude to say no after all that.
The train's about to depart. Please grab a handrail for safety.
Remembering the children, you grab her mechanical arms instead.
Instead of her mechanical arms, you grab Sophia's hands instead.
Jamilah always said... precious guests deserve a special kind of welcome.
I... not sure "special" is the word I'd use.
If you don't feel like it, I can switch anytime.
You master the four-finger clasp, just like Sophia. You link hands like train cars chugging along.
Constellia's commercial street... So, Commandant, where is our next stop of your choice?
Well, then... wherever you choose, Sophia.
The other... well, that lies in a future yet unseen.
This could be a lengthy journey.
Since the ride's on you, I'm not getting off until the final destination, no matter the distance.
